document_data.caption: A map showing Jazayir al-Sartan within the Crowded Sea.
document_data.name: Jazayir al-Sartan
document_data.aliases:
Archipelago of the Great Crab
Isles of the Crab
document_data.mainbody: '''Jazayir al-Sartan''', the '''Isles of the Crab''', formed a crab-shaped archipelago in the eastern part of the [[Crowded Sea]] of [[Zakhara]], south of [[Ajayib]]. Poorly explored and marginally settled by enlightened Zakharans, it was the home to a large number of monsters as well as savage tribes of [[halfling]]s, [[human]]s, [[ogre]]s and [[Ogre mage|ogre magi]]. Even the waters were avoided due the [[Sartani|strange crab-like monsters]].
document_data.Geography: Four major groups of islands were usually recognized within the archipelago: the larger [[Jazirat al-Sadaf]] (the "Island of the Shell") and [[Jazirat al-Qraidis]] ("Shrimp Island"), the long chain called [[Jazayir al-Alfar]] (the "Islands of the Claws") extending north and south of Jaziat al-Sadaf, and the smaller [[Uyun al-Sartan]] ("Eyes of the Crab") in the center around the so-called [[Batihat al-Saji]], the "Lagoon of the Brave".<ref>
